mapper.select: select * from resume_list order by r_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into resume_write(w_no, w_name, w_hp, w_email, w_address, w_gender, w_level, w_finish, w_major, w_fndate, w_com, w_position, w_join, w_leave, W_subject, w_score, W_get, W_license, w_getlicense) values( #{w_no}, #{w_name}, #{w_hp}, #{w_email}, #{w_address}, #{w_gender}, #{w_level}, #{w_finish}, #{w_major}, #{w_fndate}, #{w_com}, #{w_position}, #{w_join}, #{w_leave}, #{W_subject}, #{w_score}, #{W_get}, #{W_license}, #{w_getlicense} )
